name: VADI
description:
Try to survive in a big town where zombies rule in the Dark Valley, be careful with the zombies whose attacking ability is stronger at night, and you need to protect yourself with the items you find.

With detailed map design, we offer you a lot of places to explore, try to survive by colliding with zombies one on one.

you will enjoy fishing and you will not go hungry

don't forget to use a torch to light up your tough nights

Opportunity to design your own house so that you don't stay outside, a house whose interior design is yours

artificial intelligence zombies that are getting harder day by day

Remember, this will be your story. Are you ready for this adventure in the dark valley?

Game Mods

Story Mode
Write your own story, everything is in your hands, are you ready to survive in the dark valley?
Huge open world
With an area of ​​16 kilometers, it offers you many towns and places to explore
Dynamic Weather
Weather Changes Randomly
Third Party Camera
There is only one camera angle
Loot old village houses
The items you will find in the old village houses will help to protect you in the dark valley.
Crafting and Skill tree
You can improve collectibles or craft new items. As your development continues, progress will be opened for the character.
Dynamic Battle System
Are you ready to feel the wars deeply with the simplified artificial intelligence war system?
